newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-OrCAD initiated as buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-OrCAD initiated as buy.

text.p: -- Madison Securities Inc said Wednesday it initiated coverage of OrCAD Inc with a buy rating.
-- Madison estimates OrCAD's earnings at $0.13 a share for the fiscal 1997 first quarter, $0.59 for the full year and $0.84 for fiscal 1998.
-- OrCAD develops and markets software products used in the design of various elecronic components, ranging from networking equipment to medical instrumentation.
-- "Current industry trends forecast annual 30 percent-plus growth in OrCAD's target market through year 2000," analyst Jeffrey Maxick said in a report.
